alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Copiah; Hinds; Rankin; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 8:39PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN RANKIN... NORTHWESTERN SIMPSON...EAST CENTRAL CLAIBORNE...SOUTHERN HINDS AND NORTHERN COPIAH COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM CST... At 839 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Dentville, or 15 miles northwest of Hazlehurst, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dentville around 845 PM CST. Crystal Springs, Dry Grove, and Gallman around 855 PM CST. Terry around 900 PM CST. Jackson around 905 PM CST. Byram and Whites around 910 PM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for central and southwestern Mississippi.
